verses.verse: Thou <S%G4771><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son, <S%G5043><s%> be strong <S%G1743><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the things that <S%G3739><s%> thou hast heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> among <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> the same <S%G5023><s%> commit <S%G3908><s%> thou to faithful <S%G4103><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> able <S%G2425><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> others <S%G2087><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
Thou <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> endure hardness, <S%G2553><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

No man <S%G3762><s%> that warreth <S%G4754><s%> entangleth himself with <S%G1707><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> affairs <S%G4230><s%> of this life; <S%G979><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may please <S%G700><s%> him who hath chosen him to be a soldier. <S%G4758><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> strive for masteries, <S%G118><s%> yet is he not <S%G3756><s%> crowned, <S%G4737><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> he strive <S%G118><s%> lawfully. <S%G3545><s%>
The husbandman <S%G1092><s%> that laboreth <S%G2872><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be first partaker <S%G3335><s%> <S%G4413><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> fruits. <S%G2590><s%>

Consider <S%G3539><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say; <S%G3004><s%> and <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> understanding <S%G4907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> was raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I suffer trouble, <S%G2553><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> an evil doer, <S%G2557><s%> even unto <S%G3360><s%> bonds; <S%G1199><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> bound. <S%G1210><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I endure <S%G5278><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> for the elect's sakes, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1588><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may also <S%G2532><s%> obtain <S%G5177><s%> the salvation <S%G4991><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>
It is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying: <S%G3056><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we be dead with <S%G4880><s%> him, we shall also <S%G2532><s%> live with <S%G4800><s%> him:

If <S%G1487><s%> we suffer, <S%G5278><s%> we shall also <S%G2532><s%> reign with <S%G4821><s%> him: if <S%G1487><s%> we deny <S%G720><s%> him, he also <S%G2548><s%> will deny <S%G720><s%> us: <S%G2248><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we believe not, <S%G569><s%> yet he <S%G1565><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> faithful: <S%G4103><s%> he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

Of these things <S%G5023><s%> put them in remembrance, <S%G5279><s%> charging <S%G1263><s%> them before <S%G1799><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> that they strive not about words <S%G3054><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to no profit, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G5539><s%> but to <S%G1909><s%> the subverting <S%G2692><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> hearers. <S%G191><s%>

Study <S%G4704><s%> to show <S%G3936><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> unto God, <S%G2316><s%> a workman <S%G2040><s%> that needeth not to be ashamed, <S%G422><s%> rightly dividing <S%G3718><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of truth. <S%G225><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> shun <S%G4026><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and vain babblings: <S%G2757><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they will increase <S%G4298><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> ungodliness. <S%G763><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> will eat <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3542><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> doth a canker: <S%G1044><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Philetus; <S%G5372><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> have erred, <S%G795><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that the <S%G3588><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%> is past <S%G1096><s%> already; <S%G2235><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> overthrow <S%G396><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> of some. <S%G5100><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G3305><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> standeth <S%G2476><s%> sure, <S%G4731><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> them that are <S%G5607><s%> his. <S%G848><s%> And, <S%G2532><s%> Let every one <S%G3956><s%> that nameth <S%G3687><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> depart <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> iniquity. <S%G93><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> vessels <S%G4632><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of silver, <S%G693><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of wood <S%G3585><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of earth; <S%G3749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> dishonor. <S%G819><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> purge <S%G1571><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> from <S%G575><s%> these, <S%G5130><s%> he shall be <S%G2071><s%> a vessel <S%G4632><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> sanctified, <S%G37><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> meet for the master's use, <S%G2173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1203><s%> and prepared <S%G2090><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>

Flee <S%G5343><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> youthful <S%G3512><s%> lusts: <S%G1939><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them that call on <S%G1941><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart. <S%G2588><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unlearned <S%G521><s%> questions <S%G2214><s%> avoid, <S%G3868><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they do engender <S%G1080><s%> strifes. <S%G3163><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> strive; <S%G3164><s%> but <S%G235><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> gentle <S%G2261><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, apt to teach, <S%G1317><s%> patient, <S%G420><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> meekness <S%G4236><s%> instructing <S%G3811><s%> those that oppose themselves; <S%G475><s%> if God peradventure <S%G3379><s%> <S%G2316><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of the truth; <S%G225><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that they may recover themselves <S%G366><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> snare <S%G3803><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> devil, <S%G1228><s%> who are taken captive <S%G2221><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1565><s%> will. <S%G2307><s%>
